items.item: Forbidden lovers from a nearby [Settlement] run away to a [DangerousLocation].
The adventurers must protect a(n) [Person] from a(n) [Person].
A local [Person] is suspected of kidnapping people.
A local [Person] claims to have been attacked by a [Monster] on the road.
A cult is abducting people for sacrifices.
Strange lights and sounds come from a(n) [DangerousLocation].
A dying [Person] claims to have found a mother lode of [Mineral].
A cursed item comes to the adventurers passing on a corruption.
A demon possesses a(n) [Person] to fulfill an ancient obligation made with a [Person] no longer alive.
A friend asks for help in settling a duel of honor.
A respected [Person] is accused of serious crimes; is it a frame up?
Rumors are spreading of a [Person] who has returned from the dead.
A killer stalks a [Settlement] at night.
A(n) [Person] has become lost in a(n) [DangerousLocation] and need help.
[Monster]s are gathering in large numbers near a local [Settlement].
The nobles of a local [Settlement] are calling for help to find thieves that stole their riches.
A group of undead have begun guarding a(n) [DangerousLocation].
A local [Settlement] has been devastated by a mysterious [NaturalDisaster].
The group is asked to escort a caravan through dangerous territory.
The local rulers plan to execute a [=Pick('friend','family member','lover') of one of the adventurers.
A local [Person] is accused of governmental corruption
A conflict erupts between a group of [Monster]s and [Monster]s.
On their deathbed, a(n) [Person] asks for help achieving a final task.
All of the citizens of a local [Settlement] have mysteriously disappeared.
Two [Settlement]s are contesting who has rights to a local mine.
Rumors arise of a [Monster] in the nearby forest.
A(n) [Person] is seeing the near future, they foresee a [NaturalDisaster] in the local [Settlement]
A mage is granting wishes to anyone willing to pay.
The daughter of a noble has run away to an enemy [Settlement].
All of the mages in the nearby area have lost their ability to cast spells.
All of the soldiers in a nearby [Settlement] have fallen into a magical sleep just as an army gathers outside.
A(n) [Settlement] suffering from a plague say they were cursed.
The adventurers awaken with short term memory loss.
A [Person] claiming to have information about a recent murder turns up dead.
A ship of undead arrive at the docks but do not disembark.
One of the PCs [=Pick('family members','friends','lovers') is being hunted by a(n) [Enemy].
The hometown of a PC is being raided by [Monster]s.
The tarrasque is sleeping beneath a nearby mountain.
A [Location] filled with treasure and artifacts is hidden nearby.
A man is healing the sick and raising the dead for free in villages nearby.
A local [Medium] hoard is requesting a meeting with the PCs to discuss a peace treaty with the nearby [Settlement].
Once thought dead, an ancient [ChromaticDragon+MetallicDragon] was spotted in a nearby [NaturalLocation].
A(n) [Person] has come into the possession of an extremely powerful artifact.
The lair of a [Medium] group has been affected by a plague.
Every citizen of a local [Settlement] suddenly has a mysterious double that mimics them perfectly walking around.
A(n) [Person] from an unknown foreign land is claiming to have nearly escaped a genocide.
A(n) [Person] from an unknown foreign land is claiming that invaders are coming.
A(n) [ChromaticDragon+MetallicDragon] is demanding a [=Pick('human','virginal','monetary')] sacrifice monthly or it will destroy the local [Settlement].
A [=Pick('traveler from the future','prophet','mystic','witch doctor','gypsy')] is demanding to see the local ruler to warn of a catastrophe.
All of a PC's possession have been stolen.
